We can then sort all tuples in the list by the score in ascending order (best are ﬁrst), then
return this list of scores for review. The grid search() function below implements this behavior
given a univariate time series dataset, a list of model conﬁgurations (list of lists), and the
number of time steps to use in the test set. An optional parallel argument allows the evaluation
